long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
stackpie
A browser extension to Copy selection from any website with one click.
Copy selection from any website with one click. 
How to use ? 
First select a content which you want to copy 
then press copy floating button.
